item.description:
This is a Free Friday Flick at the library. It is a feel-good movie (with some local references) for all generations of music lovers. We'll watch the film and then walk down to a local place for drinks afterward.

Tagline: Rock 'n Roll Will Never Die

Synopsis:

Documents the true story of the final weeks of rehearsal for the Young at Heart Chorus in Northampton, MA, whose average age is 81, many of whom must overcome health adversities to participate. Their music is unexpected, going against the stereotype of their age group, performing songs by James Brown, The Clash, The Ramones, Coldplay and Sonic Youth.

Watch the trailer

Read the IMDb entry
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet by the couch in the gallery before (or after if you miss us)
item.name: NPL Film: Young @ Heart (2007)
